LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.label: alcoholismo
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to alcohol. Long-term presence of alcohol has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of alcohol, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: abstinencia
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.label: alcohol
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.description: Alcohol in the bloodstream. It makes people happy, but reduces capacities.
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.warm.label: contento
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.tipsy.label: con ganas de guasa
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.drunk.label: borracho
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.hammered.label: con un ciego
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.blackout.label: haciendo eses
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.label: tolerancia al alcohol
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to alcohol. The more severe this tolerance is, the more alcohol it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small-0.label: mínima
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small-1.label: ligera
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.large.label: grande
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.massive.label: altísima
LanguageData.Hangover.label: resaca
LanguageData.Hangover.description: An unpleasant delayed after-effect of alcohol intoxication
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.slight.label: ligera
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.strong.label: fuerte
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.pounding.label: gran
